short_description: This function augment the combination by adding one extra player which is not in the combination yet.
long_description: This function augment the combination by adding one extra player which is not in the combination yet. It also adds a column for binomial coefficient, which is used in computing partial Shapley values.

input_tables.name: input
input_tables.rDescription: A table output by the GenerateCombination or SortCombination function.
input_tables.description: A table output by the GenerateCombination or SortCombination function.

argument_clauses.name: CombinationColumn
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the name of the input table column that contains the combinations.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the name of the input table column that contains the combinations.

argument_clauses.name: SizeColumn
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the name of the input table column that contains the size of each combination.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the name of the input table column that contains the size of each combination.

argument_clauses.name: ValueColumn
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the name of the input table column that contains the characteristic value of each combination.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the name of the input table column that contains the characteristic value of each combination.

argument_clauses.name: NumPlayers
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the number of players in the game, a positive integer.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the number of players in the game, a positive integer.

argument_clauses.name: Delimiter
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the character that separates player numbers in combinations—either ' ' (space, the default), '#', '$', '%', or '&'.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the character that separates player numbers in combinations—either ' ' (space, the default), '#', '$', '%', or '&'.
